alert.note: Alert for Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:29PM CDT until July 22 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR OLMSTED COUNTY... At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eyota, or 8 miles east of Rochester, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Eyota around 635 PM CDT. Dover around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ringe, Predmore, County Roads 9 And 10, County Roads 137 And 136, Century High School, Cummingsville and Rochester Airport. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 206 and 231. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
